author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Know more about Cruise Meetings with Travel And Tour World October issue - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Know more about Cruise Meetings with Travel And Tour World October issue Published on : Friday, October 2, 2015
Travel And Tour World welcomes travel industry leaders and tourism professionals to take a look at the latest issue available online. Unveiling a latest and quite happening trend in the business travel industry, the October cover story explores the opportunities of cruise meetings.
This month we bring to you some of the most sought-after destinations ideal for tourists and business travelers alike. We have also highlighted the importance of sustainable and ecotourism along with some innovative technological developments in the global travel industry.
Here is what we have complied for you in the October issue:
Interview Zone: As the world travel industry shifts its focus on the upcoming ITB Asia to be held in Singapore, Ms. Katrina Leung, the Executive Director of Messe Berlin (Singapore) , the organisers of ITB Asia, share her opinions, insights and experiences leading this major travel show
Meetings Point: Considered as one of the most attractive tourism metropolises across the globe, Vienna is also a lucrative hub for holding business meetings and events. A glimpse of the Austrian capital…
Cover Story : How Cruise Meetings are trending and re-defining the outlook of the global meetings industry?
Special Feature : What’s better than food? More Food! – A sneak peak of the best food festivals for the quintessential gourmet traveler
Face to Face : In a candid conversation with Travel And Tour World, Mr. Ahmet Akpinar, the General Manager Vietnam, Turkish Airlines revealed some of the latest stories of Turkish Airlines and its recently growing network in Asia.
Career Curve : An enigmatic career in the aviation sector revealed – Duncan Bureau, Vice President, Global Sales at Air Canada speaks to Travel And Tour World
Tech iT : The most innovative and talked-about travel gear for the travel industry – The BauBax Jacket !
Travel Association : An exclusive interview with Terry Dale, the President and CEO of the USTOA
Time Travel : An attempt to build a greener travel industry by 2020
Destination Diary : The alluring tourism hotspots of Astana , the capital city of Kazakhstan
Browse through our unique flipbook to keep you abreast of the latest stories from the world travel events and most happening festivals. Feel free to write to us in case of any query and keep pouring in your feedback – we value your opinion.
To download/read the exclusive September issue of Travel And Tour World, please click here …
Meet us at ITB Asia at Hall D, Stand No: S33 and collect your free copy…
About Travel And Tour World
Travel and Tour World (TTW), a travel trade media and an information platform, is an all-inclusive and far-reaching travel magazine with a readership of more than 2, 50,000 worldwide. It endorses more than 100 trade shows where the magazine is distributed free to the decision makers of the global travel industry. In a very short span of time, our readership has augmented to 2, 50,000 which include niche readers from travel industry professionals like Tour Operators and Agents, Destination Management Companies, MICE Planners and many more.
TTW furnishes a great prospect to reach the major travel readers across the world. It is not only a boost from the business outlook but also crafts a global unique readership.
TTW imparts travel professionals with an upright global outlook through profound coverage of all tourism sectors including prominent hotels and its reviews, airlines, destinations, cruises, meeting and convention centres and lots more. The magazine keeps one abreast with the avant-garde trends as well as the latest technological boons of the industry. From MICE destinations to awe-inspiring locations, TTW wraps it all. Its gives you an insight into the Highlights and Reviews of all the International trade fairs from around the globe.
Along with the I-pad and Android accessibility, delve into Travel and Tour World in a unique flip-book format, which is freely downloadable and readable online.
